chorddht

Class WorkerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • chorddht.WorkerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkerManagement, java.rmi.Remote

    public class WorkerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkerManagement
    A management class that handles the interface between the worker threads in Chord nodes and the management server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifyReady(Task task)
      Changes status of the HashMap in the management server to indicate processing on some task is done.
      boolean ping()
      A simple ping to check if this process is still alive.

      • notifyReady

        public void notifyReady(Task task)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Changes status of the HashMap in the management server to indicate processing on some task is done.
        Specified by:
        notifyReady in interface WorkerManagement
        Parameters:
        task - The task to notify to the management server is done processing.

      • ping

        public boolean ping()
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        A simple ping to check if this process is still alive.
        Specified by:
        ping in interface WorkerManagement
        Returns:
        true if the process is alive. If not, an exception will be thrown.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
